name: Nature's Delay
description:
You are peacefully contemplating your planet when suddenly some invaders came and colonize it. They spread so fast that you can't stop them... but you want to do something at least.

Use different natural disasters to slow their conquest progress

This game was made for Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the Inevitable

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/natures-delay
